Sparsh 2015
The Techno - Cultural Fest

Events

Get thrilled beyond measure.
And I thought my jokes were bad.
See more >>

'Goonj' Singing Night

Where words fail, music speaks. Hindustani, Classical, Symphony, Orchestra, Opera, Heavy Metal, Punk rock. You name it, you get it. This is the night when the entire college congregates to witness magic unfold before their eyes. BLAHHHHHHH

'Macarena' Dancing Night

From Bharatnatyam in the south to Bhangra in the North; Garba in the west to Chauu in the East. Also mired in the concoctionwe have western dancing styles like hip-hop, salsa , jazz, boogie and rumba where the students bring out the essence of various cultures through their dances. BURPPPPPP

‘Panache’ Fashion Night

It is one of the most awaited nights in the Sparsh, where students get a chance to oomph up the glamour quotient on the ramp. This night gives you the perfect amalgam of beauty and brains. LOLOLOL
